rm_story.description: Create a POST /api/auth/login endpoint that accepts email and password, validates credentials against the database, and returns a JWT token.
rm_story.acceptance_criteria: - Endpoint accepts POST with email/password - Returns JWT on success - Rate limits to 5 attempts/minute

rm_story.description: Build a React component at /profile that displays user information including name, email, and avatar.
rm_story.acceptance_criteria: - Displays user info - Edit functionality - Form validation

rm_story.description: Implement an email service using SendGrid for welcome emails and password reset.
rm_story.acceptance_criteria: - Welcome email on registration - Password reset email - HTML templates
